meanings: [명사] reunion, [동사] meet[see] sb again, be reunited
part in the hopes of meeting again

vlive.korean: [다시 만날 날을 위해 Cheers] 우리에게 재회를 주세요! [Cheers for another reunion] Let's meet together again! 듣기 View video Golden Child : 영원하자, 우리 우정 Forever,,,★ㅣ우하동 EP.4
vlive.english: [Cheers for another reunion] Let's meet together again!

vlive.korean: [부모님과 재회하는 감격스러운 장면] 우주야! [A touching moment, reunited with his parents] Woojoo! 듣기 View video SF9 : [종영 소감] 이제는 황우주를 보내셔야 합니다.
vlive.english: [A touching moment, reunited with his parents] Woojoo!

vlive.korean: [감격의 재회는 이쯤하고 하와이를 마저 즐겨볼까?] [Should we end the touching reunion and enjoy the rest of Hawaii?] View video iKON : iKON - 'iKON 심쿵 청춘여행' 10화 예고
vlive.english: [Should we end the touching reunion and enjoy the rest of Hawaii?]

vlive.korean: [야시장 VS 태국 전통체험] [몇 시간 만에 재회한 드림걸즈] 언니 잘 갔다 왔어요? [Night Market VS Thai Traditional Village] Did you have a good time? 듣기 View video TRENDY TV(트렌디 티비) : [사다드림 시즌2] 우아한 식사와 함께하는 자기 체험 자랑타-임!_13회
vlive.english: [Night Market VS Thai Traditional Village] Did you have a good time?

vlive.korean: 극적인 재회 막 이러면서... Then meet again... 듣기 View video 키워드#보아 - my SMTelevision : [키워드#보아] Ep.17 먹방은 계속된다 (1)

examples.korean: The family was reunited after the war. 발음듣기 그 가족은 전쟁 후에 재회했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The family was reunited after the war. 발음

examples.korean: Last night she was reunited with her children. 발음듣기 어젯밤 그녀는 자녀들과 재회하게 되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Last night she was reunited with her children. 발음

examples.korean: It was a magic moment when the two sisters were reunited after 30 years. 발음듣기 그것은 두 자매가 30년 만에 재회하는 아주 특별한 순간이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It was a magic moment when the two sisters were reunited after 30 years. 발음

examples.korean: Christmas is a time of reunion. 발음듣기 크리스마스는 재회의 시기이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Christmas is a time of reunion. 발음

examples.korean: Don't be dismayed at goodbyes, a farewell is necessary before you can meet again and meeting again, after moments or lifetimes, is certain for those who are friends. (Richard Bach) 발음듣기 작별 인사에 낙담하지 말라. 재회에 앞서 작별은 필요하다. 그리고 친구라면 잠시 혹은 오랜 뒤라도 꼭 재회하게 될 터이니. (리처드 바크, 이별명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: Don't be dismayed at goodbyes, a farewell is necessary before you can meet again and meeting again, after moments or lifetimes, is certain for those who are friends. (Richard Bach) 발음
